page.title: 19STONEHENGE CLOSED TO HIPPIES
page.content: THIS YEAR'S MIDSUMMER DAY FESTIVAL AT STONEHENGE HAS BEEN BANNED BY THE NAT- IONAL TRUST,ENGLISH HERITAGE AND LOCAL FARMERS.THEY GOT A COURT ORDER AND SO THE POLICE HAVE BEEN POSTED EVERYWHERE TO STOP ANY HIPPIES GETTING TO STONE- HENGE. MANY HIPPIES TRIED TO GO TO THIS ILLEGAL FESTIVAL AND 520 WERE ARRESTED.THE POLICE BARRIERS WERE ATTACKED WHEN THE HIPPIES THREW WOOD, STONES,STICES AND MISSILES, INCUDING PETROL BOMBS.IN THIS BATTLE 7 POLICE AND 15 CONVOY MEMBERS WERE INJURED. ALTHOUGH NONE OF THE HIPPIES GOT THROUGH OVER THE WEEK-END THE POLICE WILL HAVE A HARD AND DANGEROUS JOB HOLDING THEM BACK.TO STOP THE HIPPIES FROM GETTING ANYWHERE THE COUNCIL TIPPED GRAVEL EITHER END OF THE ROAD,BUT THEY ESCAPED THROUGH FIELDS. SOME HIPPIES DROVE AT A POLICEMAN AND BROKE HIS ARM,THEY WERE ARRESTED.
